cast.overview: Having suffered a tragedy, Ben becomes a caregiver to earn money. His first client, Trevor, is a hilarious 18-year-old with muscular dystrophy. One paralyzed emotionally, one paralyzed physically, Ben and Trevor hit the road on a trip into the western states. The folks they collect along the way will help them test their skills for surviving outside their calculated existence. Together, they come to understand the importance of hope and the necessity of true friendship.
cast.title: The Fundamentals of Caring

crew.overview: Raised in a poverty-stricken slum, a 16-year-old girl named Starr now attends a suburban prep school. After she witnesses a police officer shoot her unarmed best friend, she's torn between her two very different worlds as she tries to speak her truth.
crew.title: The Hate U Give

details.biography:
Walter Hendrix III was born in Detroit, Michigan but went to school in Birmingham, Alabama. After graduating from college, he moved to Atlanta, Georgia where he began his acting career.

Walter Hendrix III has been seen in several movies, television shows, and theater plays with plans to participate and star in many more.

Walter Hendrix III has also written, directed, and produced several projects as well and has plans to produce several more over the upcoming years.
details.name: Walter Hendrix III
